author: perrotta
body:
The path HLT_HT360_SingleDisplacedPFJet60 was included by mistake in the so-called half-rate HLT menu.
This PR removes it from the menu as integrated in the 62X CMSSW, in order to facilitate the work of those making studies with that menu.
title: remove one extra path from the half rate menu: it was included by mistake
